description: A mysterious warrior from Snezhnaya, Kachina is rumored to wield Cryo powers and a polearm, freezing her enemies with swift and elegant attacks.
info: Kachina is a speculative Cryo polearm DPS from Snezhnaya. Build her for Cryo DMG, CRIT, and ATK%.

skills.name: Normal Attack: Frosted Dance
skills.desc: Performs up to 5 consecutive Cryo polearm strikes.
skills.details_html:
Normal Attack
Performs up to 5 consecutive Cryo polearm strikes.
Charged Attack
Consumes stamina to unleash a spinning Cryo attack.
Plunging Attack
Plunges from mid-air to strike the ground below, dealing AoE Cryo DMG upon impact.

skills.name: Glacial Spear
skills.desc: Kachina thrusts her spear forward, dealing AoE Cryo DMG and increasing her ATK.
skills.details_html:
Glacial Spear
Thrusts her spear forward, dealing AoE Cryo DMG and increasing Kachina's ATK for a short duration.

skills.name: Winter's Embrace
skills.desc: Kachina summons a blizzard, dealing massive AoE Cryo DMG and granting all allies increased Cryo DMG Bonus.
skills.details_html:
Winter's Embrace
Summons a blizzard, dealing massive AoE Cryo DMG and granting all allies increased Cryo DMG Bonus for a short duration.

passive_talents.name: Frozen Precision
passive_talents.desc: After using Glacial Spear, Kachina's Cryo DMG is increased by 20% for 10s.

passive_talents.name: Snezhnayan Spirit
passive_talents.desc: Allies affected by Winter's Embrace gain 20% increased ATK.

passive_talents.name: Icy Step
passive_talents.desc: When Kachina is in the party, sprinting stamina consumption is reduced by 20%.

constellations.name: C2: Frosted Zeal
constellations.desc: After using Winter's Embrace, Kachina's CRIT Rate is increased by 10% for 8s.

constellations.name: C3: Cryo Ascendant
constellations.desc: Increases the level of Glacial Spear by 3. Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: C4: Winter's Blessing
constellations.desc: Allies affected by Winter's Embrace gain 20% increased Energy Recharge.

constellations.name: C5: Embrace of the North
constellations.desc: Increases the level of Winter's Embrace by 3. Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: C6: Snezhnaya's Fury
constellations.desc: When Kachina triggers a Cryo-related reaction, her ATK is increased by 20% for 10s.
